name: Presense Bot
description: A Slackbot that works with the PreSense apps for iOS and Android

HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: Token for the bot, available from  https://my.slack.com/services/new and under 'DIY Integrations & Customizations' click the 'Add' button.

HEROKU_URL.description: URL required to keep the bot alive. Set it to https://[App Name].herokuapp.com/
